title: Trump picks attorney Brooke Rollins as US agriculture secretary
content: President-elect Donald Trump has selected Brooke Rollins, a longtime ally and former White House aide, to head the Department of Agriculture. Rollins, currently leading the America First Policy Institute, will succeed Tom Vilsack if confirmed by the Republican-controlled Senate. This appointment completes Trump's selection of executive branch department heads. Rollins's background includes agricultural development and experience in Texas politics.
summary: President-elect Donald Trump has selected Brooke Rollins, a longtime ally and former White House aide, to head the Department of Agriculture. Rollins, currently leading the America First Policy Institute, will succeed Tom Vilsack if confirmed by the Republican-controlled Senate. This appointment completes Trump's selection of executive branch department heads. Rollins's background includes agricultural development and experience in Texas politics.

title: Los Angeles assistant principal arrested for sexual abuse of eight elementary school students
content: David Lane Braff Jr., an assistant principal in Los Angeles, faces 17 felony counts for allegedly molesting eight students, some as young as six, between 2015 and 2019. Braff, who worked as a counselor at a Santa Paula elementary school during that time, is accused of committing the abuse in a school office.
summary: David Lane Braff Jr., an assistant principal in Los Angeles, faces 17 felony counts for allegedly molesting eight students, some as young as six, between 2015 and 2019. Braff, who worked as a counselor at a Santa Paula elementary school during that time, is accused of committing the abuse in a school office.

title: French plastic surgeon suspended after patients' complaint he left them with 'potato' noses
content: French plastic surgeon Olivier Gerbault, known as the “nose maestro,” has been suspended for two years following accusations of botched surgeries. Multiple patients allege that Gerbault, who claimed to have pioneered a new rhinoplasty technique, left them disfigured and traumatized.
summary: French plastic surgeon Olivier Gerbault, known as the “nose maestro,” has been suspended for two years following accusations of botched surgeries. Multiple patients allege that Gerbault, who claimed to have pioneered a new rhinoplasty technique, left them disfigured and traumatized.

title: Canada's military chief calls out US Senator for comments on women's role in combat: 'Can't believe we still have to justify...'
content: Canadian General Jennie Carignan publicly criticized US Senator Jim Risch for his outdated views on women in combat. Risch had expressed skepticism about women serving in combat roles, prompting Carignan, the first woman to lead Canada's military, to deliver a powerful rebuke.
summary: Canadian General Jennie Carignan publicly criticized US Senator Jim Risch for his outdated views on women in combat. Risch had expressed skepticism about women serving in combat roles, prompting Carignan, the first woman to lead Canada's military, to deliver a powerful rebuke.

title: Trump ally Lindsey Graham warns UK, Canada, and other countries of sanctions for aiding Netanyahu arrest: 'We should crush your economy'
content: UK's potential assistance in arresting Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu under an ICC warrant has drawn ire from US Senator Lindsey Graham. Graham threatens severe economic sanctions against any nation aiding the ICC, arguing it undermines US allies and risks setting a precedent for targeting American politicians.
summary: UK's potential assistance in arresting Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu under an ICC warrant has drawn ire from US Senator Lindsey Graham. Graham threatens severe economic sanctions against any nation aiding the ICC, arguing it undermines US allies and risks setting a precedent for targeting American politicians.

title: Joe Rogan is ready to do this if Elon Musk buys MSNBC: 'I will tell...'
content: Elon Musk engaged in a humorous exchange with Joe Rogan on X, entertaining the idea of purchasing MSNBC. Rogan jokingly expressed interest in taking over Rachel Maddow's role, prompting a playful "deal" from Musk. The exchange followed Donald Trump Jr.'s suggestion that Musk buy the network, citing its declining ratings.
summary: Elon Musk engaged in a humorous exchange with Joe Rogan on X, entertaining the idea of purchasing MSNBC. Rogan jokingly expressed interest in taking over Rachel Maddow's role, prompting a playful "deal" from Musk. The exchange followed Donald Trump Jr.'s suggestion that Musk buy the network, citing its declining ratings.

Meghan Markle's half-sister says what she did to Royal Family is...
content: "I knew my dad had suffered but I thought she would stop at the Queen," Samantha said in an interview with DailyMail. Samantha said she used to consider Prince Harry as the victim initially but he had an equal part in alienating the Royal Family through his memoir 'Spare'. ​Samantha wants Meghan to contact their father, but she herself doesn't want to patch things up with Meghan. "If you accept an olive branch, you are asking to be hurt again," Samantha said.
summary: "I knew my dad had suffered but I thought she would stop at the Queen," Samantha said in an interview with DailyMail. Samantha said she used to consider Prince Harry as the victim initially but he had an equal part in alienating the Royal Family through his memoir 'Spare'. ​Samantha wants Meghan to contact their father, but she herself doesn't want to patch things up with Meghan. "If you accept an olive branch, you are asking to be hurt again," Samantha said.

title: Kanye West sued for sexually assaulting, strangling model in 2010: 'This is f**king art'
content: On camera, Kanye West began to choke her with one hand and then "wrapped his other hand around her neck and continued to strangle her with both hands". West smothered her face with both of his hands smearing her makeup. “He then rammed several fingers down her throat, continuously moved them in and out, and gagged her … to emulate forced oral sex,” the complaint further alleged.
summary: On camera, Kanye West began to choke her with one hand and then "wrapped his other hand around her neck and continued to strangle her with both hands". West smothered her face with both of his hands smearing her makeup. “He then rammed several fingers down her throat, continuously moved them in and out, and gagged her … to emulate forced oral sex,” the complaint further alleged.

title: British teen Marcus Fakana held for sex with 17-year-old girl while holidaying in Dubai
content: An 18-year-old British tourist, Marcus Fakana, is facing potential jail time in Dubai for engaging in a relationship with a 17-year-old girl. Although the girl has since turned 18, their relationship began while she was still a minor under UAE law. Fakana was arrested after the girl's mother reported their relationship to Dubai authorities.
summary: An 18-year-old British tourist, Marcus Fakana, is facing potential jail time in Dubai for engaging in a relationship with a 17-year-old girl. Although the girl has since turned 18, their relationship began while she was still a minor under UAE law. Fakana was arrested after the girl's mother reported their relationship to Dubai authorities.

title: Pakistan issues special commemorative coin to mark Guru Nanak's 555th birth anniversary
Elon Musk was a flaming Democrat, says father. 'We fought over Trump in 2016'
content: ​Elon was a raging Democrat but now he is embracing his heritage and his destiny, his father said. "When you come from South Africa, Lefties think you're a Nazi. To succeed, you need to be accepted by them so my sons, [Elon and Kimbal], started to become these flaming liberals – turning away from South Africa and their roots, which included me."
summary: ​Elon was a raging Democrat but now he is embracing his heritage and his destiny, his father said. "When you come from South Africa, Lefties think you're a Nazi. To succeed, you need to be accepted by them so my sons, [Elon and Kimbal], started to become these flaming liberals – turning away from South Africa and their roots, which included me."

title: Elon Musk, Vivek Ramaswamy know many federal employees will quit because...
content: In their joint opinion piece for the Wall Street Journal, Elon Musk and Vivek Ramaswamy explained how their Department of Government Efficiency will work and wrap up the work by July 4, 2026. ​"We are entrepreneurs, not politicians. We will serve as outside volunteers, not federal officials or employees. Unlike government commissions or advisory committees, we won’t just write reports or cut ribbons. We’ll cut costs," they wrote.
summary: In their joint opinion piece for the Wall Street Journal, Elon Musk and Vivek Ramaswamy explained how their Department of Government Efficiency will work and wrap up the work by July 4, 2026. ​"We are entrepreneurs, not politicians. We will serve as outside volunteers, not federal officials or employees. Unlike government commissions or advisory committees, we won’t just write reports or cut ribbons. We’ll cut costs," they wrote.

title: Pam Bondi says there is 'no legal basis' to keep names private in Jeffrey Epstein documents
content: Former Florida attorney general and Trump's nominee for US attorney General, Pam Bondi, has sparked controversy by advocating for the release of names from the Jeffrey Epstein case files. Bondi argues that concealing identities obstructs justice and shields potential wrongdoers. Her stance has ignited public debate, with some praising her transparency and others accusing her of political maneuvering.
summary: Former Florida attorney general and Trump's nominee for US attorney General, Pam Bondi, has sparked controversy by advocating for the release of names from the Jeffrey Epstein case files. Bondi argues that concealing identities obstructs justice and shields potential wrongdoers. Her stance has ignited public debate, with some praising her transparency and others accusing her of political maneuvering.

title: Republican senators eager to see Tulsi Gabbard's FBI file because of her Snowden stance
content: Checking FBI files is a norm for all Cabinet nominees but for Tulsi Gabbard, the senators want to look if some previously unknown information, including possible foreign contacts, come out. As of now, however, they are treating Gabbard with deference and not criticizing her publicly. Sen. John Cornyn (R-Texas), an Intelligence Committee member, said to Punchbowl that he has “no doubt that she’s a patriot,” but he wants to question Gabbard on her posture toward Russia.
summary: Checking FBI files is a norm for all Cabinet nominees but for Tulsi Gabbard, the senators want to look if some previously unknown information, including possible foreign contacts, come out. As of now, however, they are treating Gabbard with deference and not criticizing her publicly. Sen. John Cornyn (R-Texas), an Intelligence Committee member, said to Punchbowl that he has “no doubt that she’s a patriot,” but he wants to question Gabbard on her posture toward Russia.

title: MSNBC's Joy Reid says Trump govt would shoot Americans; gives Thanksgiving warning to Republicans
content: ​Joy Reid's on-air statement came as she issued a TikTok warning to Republican voters saying that their liberal friends may not welcome them on Thanksgiving because they are rightfully scared of those who voted for Trump. ​"You may want to step back and think about why people feel the way that they do...If you're sad that you're losing friends over this, I don't know what to tell you," the MSNBC host said to Republicans.
summary: ​Joy Reid's on-air statement came as she issued a TikTok warning to Republican voters saying that their liberal friends may not welcome them on Thanksgiving because they are rightfully scared of those who voted for Trump. ​"You may want to step back and think about why people feel the way that they do...If you're sad that you're losing friends over this, I don't know what to tell you," the MSNBC host said to Republicans.

title: Why Elon Musk's ex-girlfriend Grimes says he is 'not the man she fell in love with'
content: Grimes shared her struggle in detaching from Musk, whom she once described as the love of her life. She highlighted how his shift towards conservative political ideologies, including his contentious relationship with his transgender daughter, Vivian Jenna Wilson, has made him seem "unrecognizable" to her. The artist has been vocal in her support for Vivian, contrasting with Musk’s alleged actions that she finds difficult to reconcile with the person she once knew.
summary: Grimes shared her struggle in detaching from Musk, whom she once described as the love of her life. She highlighted how his shift towards conservative political ideologies, including his contentious relationship with his transgender daughter, Vivian Jenna Wilson, has made him seem "unrecognizable" to her. The artist has been vocal in her support for Vivian, contrasting with Musk’s alleged actions that she finds difficult to reconcile with the person she once knew.

title: Donald Trump's phone call to Matt Gaetz: 'You don't have the votes'
content: The real reason why Matt Gaetz withdrew his nomination for attorney general was a call from Donald Trump hours before Gaetz announced his decision. Despite lobbying efforts by Gaetz, Trump, and JD Vance, Gaetz lacked the necessary votes for confirmation. Gaetz stated his decision aimed to avoid distractions and ensure a swift transition for the Trump administration. Pam Bondi was nominated as his replacement.
summary: The real reason why Matt Gaetz withdrew his nomination for attorney general was a call from Donald Trump hours before Gaetz announced his decision. Despite lobbying efforts by Gaetz, Trump, and JD Vance, Gaetz lacked the necessary votes for confirmation. Gaetz stated his decision aimed to avoid distractions and ensure a swift transition for the Trump administration. Pam Bondi was nominated as his replacement.

title: How Elon Musk added 70 billion dollars to his wealth since Trump won
content: He might as well have been speaking about his new BFF and the nation’s first buddy Elon Musk who just can’t stop winning since Donald Trump came back to power. Elon Musk, already a dominant force in the business world, has now cemented his place in history as the wealthiest person ever. Thanks to a $70 billion surge in his net worth following Donald Trump's election victory, Musk’s fortune has soared to unparalleled levels, making him not only the richest individual alive but also the wealthiest ever tracked by Forbes.
